page.title: 08Home Life. Schoolchild
page.content: I get up at 7:30 every morning. I have my breakfast with my parents and we set off from home around 8:30 in the car. Our school starts at 9.00 a.m. and finishes at 3:30 p.m. When I go home I have my tea and watch childrens' programmes on T.V. They usually finish at 6:00 p.m. If I have homework it usually takes about three quarters of an hour. Sometimes around 7:00 p.m. we go out to play for an hour. Then I have a bath and we have supper. We have biscuits or buttered toast and a drink of hot chocolate. Then I get undressed and go to bed.
